basics.name: Javier Murgoitio Esandi
basics.label: Ph.D. Student Researcher
basics.summary: Ph.D. student specializing in the application of deep learning techniques to scientific problems.

work.name: Sandia National Laboratories
work.position: Uncertainty Quantification and Machine Learning in Physics Model - Intern
work.summary: Development of software tools to expand the capabilities of uncertainty quantification in deep learning. Conduct research to improve the understanding of MCMC sampling methods in Bayesian deep learning.

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
